SEARCH

Class Database

java.lang.Object
Database
public class Database extends Object
The Database class provides methods to interact with the database for managing users, exams, questions, student exams, student answers, and exam results.

      Throws:

    • validateLogin

      public static User validateLogin(String email, String password) throws SQLException
      Validates user login credentials.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      The User object if the credentials are valid, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • addExam

      public static void addExam(int teacherId, String title, int duration)
      Adds a new exam to the database.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher creating the exam.
      title - The title of the exam.
      duration - The duration of the exam in minutes.

    • startStudentExam

      public static void startStudentExam(int studentId, int examId, Timestamp startTime) throws SQLException
      Starts a student exam by recording the start time and status in the database.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student taking the exam.
      examId - The ID of the exam.
      startTime - The start time of the exam.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • submitStudentExam

      Parameters:

      examId - The ID of the exam.

      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
